about.description: ANTLR (ANother Tool for Language Recognition) is a powerful parser generator for reading, processing, executing, or translating structured text or binary files.

name: antlr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "antlr" %}
{% set version = "4.7.2" %}
{% set sha256 = "46f5e1af5f4bd28ade55cb632f9a069656b31fc8c2408f9aa045f9b5f5caad64" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/{{ name }}/{{ name }}{{ version[0] }}/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 2

requirements:
  build:
    - maven
  run:
    - openjdk

test:
  commands:
    - antlr4

about:
  home: http://www.antlr.org
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: ANother Tool for Language Recognition (ANTLR).
  description: >
    ANTLR (ANother Tool for Language Recognition) is a powerful parser
    generator for reading, processing, executing, or translating
    structured text or binary files.
  dev_url: https://github.com/antlr/antlr4
  doc_url: https://github.com/antlr/antlr4/blob/master/doc/index.md

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ocefpaf
    - kwilcox
    - bollwyvl
